creators.title: Meet Our Creators
creators.description: Discover talented photographers and artists from around the world

stories.title: Creator Stories
stories.description: Explore the stories and inspiration behind our creators

help.title: Help Center
help.description: Find all the help and support you need

account.question1: How do I create an account?
account.answer1: Click the sign up button in the top right corner and fill in the required information.

upload.question1: How do I upload my work?
upload.answer1: After logging in, click the upload button and select the work you want to share.

privacy.question1: How can I protect my work?
privacy.answer1: You can set privacy options and copyright information when uploading your work.

help.needMoreHelp: Couldn't find what you're looking for?

footer.description: Share and discover amazing photography from around the world

events.title: Events & Competitions
events.description: Join our photography events, competitions, and exhibitions. Showcase your talent and win amazing prizes!
events.winnersDescription: Browse all winning works and creators
events.noEvents: No events found in this category

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are dedicated to creating a vibrant community for photographers and artists
about.mission: Our mission is to connect creators from around the world, providing them with a platform to showcase and share their work, fostering artistic exchange and collaboration. Through our platform, every creator can find their audience and let their art illuminate lives.
about.vision: We aspire to become the most influential creative community globally, where everyone passionate about photography and art can find inspiration and realize their dreams. We believe that art has no boundaries and creativity knows no limits.

auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
